favourite.article: When I decided to stay in Australia, many trials have come my way. I shed so much tears..the agony of being so alone and so lonely stroked me. For months I was on counselling. My grief was beyond compare, but I never complain. I cry, I pray, I talk to God about my desires, and many times He has answered my prayers. Now I worry less. I know that everything under the sun is in His control. Why should I worry? God made me closer to Him. His name I always call. Today I attended church and this song came out. My tears just keep on falling. God is good And His love is everlasting. I love You my Lord.

Have been anxious about uncertainties surrounding a move for me and my family. This song was and is such a blessing and encouraged my heart! Will keep it near and commit it to memory. Next to Scripture Itself, nothing is sweeter for the saints than solid and biblically accurate hymns. This song was written 100 years ago and we find much encouragement in it.
Yes, amen! Anywhere with Jesus is a house of praise! This song is so simple and makes me feel so full of joy! Anywhere with Jesus will be home, sweet, home! What security and joy we have in Jesus!

God is alive to me through this song. I was stranded in a strange country, without money or accommodation. I sat by the pool in Sandton of Johannesburg and wrote this song in my book. Then asked God what did the writer of this song mean God? Alleluia! God keeps His word. He provided in ways unimaginable.
Going through some personal stuff today and this song is a reminder that Jesus my Redeemer lives and that He goes through everything with me holding my hand.
Praise the Lord for such an uplifting song!!! ...wonderful way to be reminded that He will NEVER leave us! :)
Each time I listen the song, I remember so many times of my life that this great promises come to pass. It is wonderful to trust in Jesus.
Very assuring once trusted to allow Him to be with in all sphere of life and lead you.
I'm just rescued from death by Jesus.
Indeed anywhere with Jesus, His sons and daughters can go with confidence. It is heart warming to know that Jesus is with us wherever we go. What should we fear?
May the Lord remember the saints in Japan . Comfort them , their family members, friends with all havenly encouragements .

this is assuring, that today's Christian songwriters can give us inspiring real gospel based hymns. this piece also confirms the central theme of the redeemer JESUS.I can only say thank you. MAY GOD BE CONTINUALLY BE PRAISED AND GLORIFIED AMEN
I like the song because it makes me glad of the value of Christ's presence at all times.

Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go! How encouraging to know that in Jesus we can say "Lord, anywhere!". He may lead us to a way that is hard to follow, but there is no safer way than a way in which He leads. "He may lead us over dreary way", but we know that this dreary way is a way that ends in ceaseless praise. There is no mistake when we follow the Lord. Saints, we can have the confidence in Christ to say "Lord, anywhere!" This song is deep. It's been through death and has risen out in resurrection! Let's experience Him in this way!

Amen. It is very rich. ''Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go.'' Praise the Lord the Lord is with us. Wherever we are, He is saving us, directing us. He is a wonderful Person living within us. Hallelujah.

What an incredible song! We sang it in church the other day, and I was struck with the truth and relevance for our times, though it was written so comparatively long ago. Give me the old-time religion and the old-time hymns!
Although we need earthly friends, none can compare with the love of Jesus. This hymn is for all of us who need reminding, that whatever happens in our lives He has it covered with His mercy. Amen.
What wonderful security is displayed in this song to a Christian.......when we have a Friend in Jesus, who is with us everyday all the way through everything.
